history.proof: qauto use: symetrique, transitive, abba, angle_nul, non_zero_pi.

original: intros A B C M P Q T H1 H2 H3 H4 H5 H6. apply changement_base_cocyclique_2 with C B; [intro H7; apply H6; apply colineaire_modulo_pi with (vec C A) zero |]. - now apply colineaire_modulo_pi with (vec C Q) zero. - apply deux_rectangles. + now apply H4. + now apply H5.
